tool_description: Manages social media campaigns across multiple platforms to engage donors through targeted posts, stories, and community interaction tracking.

platforms.description: Social media platforms to use: facebook, instagram, twitter, linkedin

content_type.description: Type of social content: post, story, video, or live_event

target_audience.description: Audience targeting: current_donors, prospects, general_public, or custom

posting_schedule.description: Posting frequency: immediate, daily, weekly, or custom

error_messages: Platform not supported: One or more platforms in the list are not supported or properly configured.
Invalid content type: content_type must be one of: post, story, video, live_event.
Invalid audience: target_audience must be one of: current_donors, prospects, general_public, custom.
Invalid schedule format: posting_schedule must be a valid option or date-time format.
Hashtag limit exceeded: Maximum 20 hashtags allowed per campaign.
Platform authentication failed: Unable to authenticate with one or more selected platforms.
usage: Select platforms array, content_type, target_audience, and posting_schedule. Optionally add relevant hashtags. The tool creates and schedules social media content across specified platforms.

platforms_active.description: List of platforms where content is active

estimated_reach.description: Estimated audience reach across all platforms
